author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Government Railway Police (GRP) in Tamil Nadu has taken to social media to reach a wider audience. The GRP recently launched its Twitter account — Railway Police CNI (@grpchennai).

A senior official of GRP said the department felt there was a need to interact with passengers on a wider platform and hence, Twitter was chosen. He said they have been getting positive feedback on its social media presence.

Also, the social media platform could be used for sharing awareness issues and contact details with the public. A team is engaged in providing live tweets to the public.

The railway police has been getting positive feedback about its social media presence
title: GRP reaches rail passengers via Twitter
